alert.note: Alert for Garza; Kent (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Kent and southeastern Garza Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Lake Alan Henry, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Alan Henry, Justiceburg and Clairemont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
